Q.1. WHAT IS YOUR PRESENT GRADE*  1. SECOND LIEUTENANT 2. FIRST LIEUTENANT 3. CAPTAIN 4. MAJOR 0. NO ANSWER

Q.4D. NUMBER OF MONTHS SERVED AS MAJOR*  ANP (2 DIGITS, MONTHS AS MAJOR) 01. ONE MONTH . . . 72. 72 MONTHS OR MORE 00. HAVE NEVER SERVED IN THIS GRADE 99. NO ANSWER

Q.7. HOW MUCH EDUCATION HAVE YOU HAD*  1. LESS THAN 8TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 3. SOME HIGH SCHOOL OR TRADE SCHOOL 4. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 5. SOME COLLEGE 6. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 7. GRADUATE STUDY IN COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.8. ARE YOU ...*  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED 3. DIVORCED 4. WIDOWED 5. SEPARATED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.9. DID YOU GET MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY*  1. I AM NOT MARRIED 2. MARRIED BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 3. MARRIED AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY 0. NO ANSWER
Q.10. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAVE*  1. I AM NOT MARRIED 2. NONE 3. ONE CHILD 4. TWO CHILDREN 5. THREE OR MORE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.11. WHAT ARM OR SERVICE ARE YOU IN*  01. MEDICAL 02. INFANTRY 03. TRANSPORTATION 04. QUARTERMASTER 05. ORDNANCE 06. FIELD ARTILLERY 07. ADJUTANT GENERAL,S DEPT. 08. CORPS OF ENGINEERS 09. SIGNAL 10. OTHER 11. CHEMICAL WARFARE 12. AUS, BI, NMB, ETC. 00. NO ANSWER

Q.12. HOW DID YOU OBTAIN YOUR COMMISSION*  1. FROM OFFICER CANDIDATE SCHOOL 2. FROM R.O.T.C. OR C.M.T.C. 3. FROM WEST POINT 4. THROUGH EXTENSION COURSES 5. COMMISSIONED DIRECT FROM ENLISTED STATUS 6. COMMISSIONED DIRECT FROM CIVILIAN LIFE 7. ALL OTHER ANSWERS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.13. WHAT WERE YOU DOING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY*  1. IN BUSINESS OR PROFESSION FOR MYSELF 2. WORKING AT A PAID JOB 3. GOING TO SCHOOL 4. LOOKING FOR WORK 0. NO ANSWER X. CODES AND DATA NOT PROVIDED FOR Q.14-Q.17.
Q.18. HOW MUCH ASSISTANCE IN YOUR JOB DO YOU RECEIVE FROM YOUR SUPERIORS*  1. NONE 2. SOME, BUT NOT ENOUGH 3. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 4. MORE THAN NECESSARY 5. ENTIRELY TOO MUCH 0. NO ANSWER

Q.19. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU HAVE SOME GOOD SUGGESTIONS AS TO HOW YOUR JOB OR OTHER THINGS IN YOUR OUTFIT COULD BE DONE BETTER OR EASIER*  1. I HAVE PLENTY OF SUGGESTIONS 2. I HAVE A FEW SUGGESTIONS 3. NOTHING TO SUGGEST 0. NO ANSWER
Q.20. HOW EASY DO YOU FEEL IT IS TO GET YOUR SUGGESTIONS CONSIDERED BY THOSE WHO COULD PUT THEM TO USE*  1. VERY EASY 2. QUITE EASY 3. NOT VERY EASY 4. VERY DIFFICULT 5. DON,T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
Q.21. IN GENERAL, DO YOU SPEND MOST OF YOUR TIME ON YOUR JOB DOING ADMINISTRATIVE OR TECHNICAL WORK*  1. ADMINISTRATIVE WORK 2. TECHNICAL WORK 3. COMBINATION OF BOTH 0. NO ANSWER
Q.22. DOES YOUR ARMY ASSIGNMENT REQUIRE ANY SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TRAINING*  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
Q.23A. DO YOU HAVE ANY SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TRAINING WHICH YOU USE ON YOUR ARMY ASSIGNMENT*  1. YES 2. NO 3. MY ARMY ASSIGNMENT DOES NOT REQUIRE ANY SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TRAINING 0. NO ANSWER

Q.23B. IF YOU USE A SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TRAINING ON YOUR ARMY ASSIGNMENT, HOW MUCH DO YOU USE IT*  1. I USE THIS TRAINING ALL THE TIME 2. I USE THIS TRAINING MOST OF THE TIME 3. I USE THIS TRAINING ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. I SELDOM USE THIS TRAINING 5. I NEVER USE THIS TRAINING 6. MY ARMY ASSIGNMENT DOES NOT REQUIRE ANY SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TRAINING 0. NO ANSWER

Q.24. IF YOU USE ANY SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TRAINING ON YOUR ARMY ASSIGNMENT, WHERE DID YOU GET THIS TRAINING*  1. FROM CIVILIAN SCHOOL 2. FROM EXPERIENCE ON MY CIVILIAN JOB 3. FROM BOTH CIVILIAN SCHOOL AND CIVILIAN EMPLOYMENT 4. MY ARMY ASSIGNMENT DOES NOT REQUIRE ANY SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TRAINING 0. NO ANSWER
Q.25A. HAVE YOU ANY SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TRAINING WHICH YOU ARE NOT USING ON YOUR PRESENT ASSIGNMENT, WHICH COULD BE USED ON A DIFFERENT ARMY ASSIGNMENT*  1. YES, LEGAL TRAINING 2. NOT CHOSEN

Q.25B. WHERE DID YOU GET THIS SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TRAINING*  1. FROM CIVILIAN SCHOOL 2. FROM EXPERIENCE ON MY CIVILIAN JOB 3. FROM BOTH CIVILIAN SCHOOL AND CIVILIAN EMPLOYMENT 4. I HAVE NO SUCH SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TRAINING 0. NO ANSWER

Q.26. WOULD YOU TRANSFER TO AN ARMY ASSIGNMENT WHERE YOU COULD USE YOUR SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TRAINING NOT NOW USED, IF THE OPPORTUNITIES FOR PROMOTION WERE THE SAME AS IN YOUR PRESENT ASSIGNMENT*  1. YES, I WOULD TRANSFER 2. NO, I WOULD NOT TRANSFER 3. UNDECIDED ABOUT SUCH TRANSFER 4. I USE MY SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TECHNICAL TRAINING ON MY PRESENT ASSIGNMENT 5. I DO NOT HAVE ANY SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TECHNICAL TRAINING 0. NO ANSWER

Q.27. SINCE RECEIVING YOUR COMMISSION DID YOU EVER COMPLETE A FULL-TIME SPECIALIZED SCHOOL OR COURSE (SUCH AS A WEAPONS OR EQUIPMENT SCHOOL FOR YOUR BRANCH OR A COURSE ON SOME SPECIALIZED PHASE OF ARMY ADMINISTRATION)*  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

Q.28. IN YOUR PRESENT ASSIGNMENT HOW MUCH ARE YOU USING THE TRAINING YOU GOT AT THE SPECIALIZED SCHOOL OR COURSE*  1. I USE THIS TRAINING ALL THE TIME 2. I USE THIS TRAINING MOST OF THE TIME 3. I USE THIS TRAINING ABOUT HALF OF THE TIME 4. I HARDLY EVER USE THIS TRAINING 5. I NEVER USE THIS TRAINING 6. I DID NOT GO TO ANY SPECIALIZED SCHOOL OR COURSE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.29. WOULD YOU TRANSFER TO ANY ARMY ASSIGNMENT WHERE YOU COULD USE YOUR TRAINING FROM A SPECIALIZED ARMY SCHOOL OR COURSE, IF CHANCES FOR PROMOTION WERE THE SAME AS IN YOUR PRESENT ASSIGNMENT*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. I HAVE NO SUCH SPECIALIZED ARMY TRAINING 5. I USE MY SPECIALIZED ARMY TRAINING ON MY PRESENT ASSIGNMENT 0. NO ANSWER

Q.30. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR WORK COULD BE DONE SATISFACTORILY BY AN OFFICER WITH LESS TRAINING THAN YOU HAVE*  1. NONE OF IT COULD BE DONE BY ANOTHER OFFICER WITH LESS TRAINING 2. A LITTLE OF IT COULD 3. MUCH OF IT COULD 4. ALMOST ALL OF IT COULD 5. ALL OF IT COULD 0. NO ANSWER

Q.31. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR WORK COULD BE SATISFACTORILY DONE BY AN OFFICER OF LESS ABILITY THAN YOU HAVE*  1. NONE OF IT COULD BE DONE BY AN OFFICER WITH LESS ABILITY 2. A LITTLE OF IT COULD 3. MUCH OF IT COULD 4. ALMOST ALL OF IT COULD 5. ALL OF IT COULD 0. NO ANSWER

Q.32. DO YOU FEEL THAT ANY OF YOUR WORK COULD BE DONE SATISFACTORILY BY A WARRANT OFFICER*  1. NONE OF IT COULD BE DONE BY A WARRANT OFFICER 2. A LITTLE OF IT COULD 3. MUCH OF IT COULD 4. ALMOST ALL OF IT COULD 5. ALL OF IT COULD 0. NO ANSWER

Q.33. DO YOU FEEL THAT ANY OF YOUR WORK COULD BE DONE SATISFACTORILY BY AN ENLISTED MAN*  1. NONE OF IT COULD BE DONE BY AN ENLISTED MAN 2. A LITTLE OF IT COULD 3. MUCH OF IT COULD 4. ALMOST ALL OF IT COULD 5. ALL OF IT COULD 0. NO ANSWER

Q.34. DO YOU FEEL THAT ANY OF YOUR WORK COULD BE DONE SATISFACTORILY BY A CIVILIAN*  1. NONE OF IT COULD BE DONE BY A CIVILIAN 2. A LITTLE OF IT COULD 3. MUCH OF IT COULD 4. ALMOST ALL OF IT COULD 5. ALL OF IT COULD 0. NO ANSWER

Q.35. IF IT WERE NOT FOR THE TABLE OF ORGANIZATION AND CUSTOM, DO YOU THINK YOUR WORK WOULD REALLY REQUIRE AN OFFICER*  1. IT REALLY REQUIRES AN OFFICER 2. AN OFFICER WOULD NOT REALLY BE REQUIRED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.36. COULD YOUR ARMY JOB BE COMBINED WITH THAT OF SOMEONE ELSE AND BE DONE SATISFACTORILY BY HIM AS PART OF HIS JOB*  1. SOME OF IT COULD 2. ABOUT HALF OF IT COULD 3. MOST OF IT COULD 4. ALL OF IT COULD 5. NO, NONE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.37. CONSIDERING YOUR MILITARY AND CIVILIAN BACKGROUND AND TRAINING, HOW DO YOU BELIEVE YOU COULD CONTRIBUTE MOST TO WINNING THE WAR*  1. BY HAVING A DIFFERENT ASSIGNMENT IN THE ZONE OF THE INTERIOR 2. BY HAVING AN ASSIGNMENT IN A COMBAT ZONE 3. BY REMAINING ON MY PRESENT ASSIGNMENT 4. AS A CIVILIAN WORKING ON A WAR JOB 5. BOTH 1 AND 2 CODES CHECKED 6. BOTH 2 AND 3 CODES CHECKED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.38. HOW MUCH WORK HAS THERE USUALLY BEEN TO DO ON YOUR JOB OR ASSIGNMENT DURING THE LAST FEW WEEKS*  1. USUALLY MORE THAN ENOUGH TO DO 2. USUALLY ABOUT ENOUGH TO DO FOR A FULL DAY,S WORK 3. USUALLY LESS THAN ENOUGH TO DO 0. NO ANSWER

Q.39. WOULD YOU TRANSFER TO SOME OTHER ARMY ASSIGNMENT, IF GIVEN A CHANCE* (TO WHAT ASSIGNMENT WOULD YOU TRANSFER*)  1. NO 2. UNDECIDED 3. YES, DEPENDING ON THE ASSIGNMENT, AN ASSIGNMENT WRITTEN IN 4. YES, TO ALMOST ANY OTHER ASSIGNMENT 5. YES, NO ASSIGNMENT WRITTEN IN 0. NO ANSWER
Q.40. DO YOU FEEL THAT EVERYTHING POSSIBLE HAS BEEN DONE TO PLACE YOU IN THE ARMY ASSIGNMENT WHERE YOU BEST FIT*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.41. HOW WELL SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY ASSIGNMENT INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY ASSIGNMENT*  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. IT DOES NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 4. DISSATISFIED 5. VERY DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.42. DO YOU THINK YOU COULD HANDLE AN ARMY ASSIGNMENT REQUIRING MORE ABILITY AND EXPERIENCE THAN IS NEEDED IN THE WORK YOU ARE NOW DOING*  1. I AM SURE I COULD 2. I THINK I COULD 3. I DO NOT KNOW WHETHER I COULD OR NOT 4. I DO NOT THINK I COULD 5. I COULD NOT 0. NO ANSWER

Q.43. WHEN YOU ARE ON THE JOB, HOW ENTHUSIASTIC DO YOU FEEL ABOUT WHAT YOU ARE DOING*  1. VERY ENTHUSIASTIC 2. ENTHUSIASTIC 3. FAIRLY ENTHUSIASTIC 4. NOT VERY ENTHUSIASTIC 5. NOT AT ALL ENTHUSIASTIC 0. NO ANSWER

Q.44. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING BEST APPLIES TO YOUR ASSIGNMENT*  1. TIME ALWAYS PASSES QUICKLY 2. TIME USUALLY PASSES QUICKLY 3. SOME HOURS DRAG WHILE OTHERS PASS QUICKLY 4. TIME USUALLY DRAGS 5. TIME ALWAYS DRAGS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.45. DO YOU THINK YOUR PRESENT ARMY ASSIGNMENT GIVES YOU A FAIR CHANCE FOR PROMOTION*  1. YES 2. NO (NO ANSWER AS TO WHY; UNDECIDED OR DON,T KNOW) 3. NO, BECAUSE OF TABLE OF ORGANIZATION (OR TABLE OF ORGANIZATION AND SOMETHING ELSE MENTIONED) 4. NO, BECAUSE OF FAVORITISM (AND TABLE OF ORGANIZATION IS NOT MENTIONED AT ALL) 0. NO ANSWER
Q.46. DO YOU THINK YOUR PRESENT ARMY ASSIGNMENT GIVES YOU A CHANCE TO SHOW WHAT YOU CAN DO*  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

Q.47. HOW DOES YOUR PRESENT ARMY GRADE COMPARE WITH THAT OF OFFICERS YOU KNOW WHO HAVE ABOUT THE SAME AMOUNT OF COMMISSIONED SERVICE*  1. MY GRADE IS HIGHER THAN THAT OF OTHERS I KNOW 2. MY GRADE IS ABOUT THE SAME AS THAT OF OTHERS I KNOW 3. MY GRADE IS LOWER THAN THAT OF OTHERS I KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

Q.48. DOES YOUR ARMY JOB KEEP YOU WORKING AT CAPACITY, OR ARE YOU SOMETIMES REQUIRED TO BE PRESENT WHEN THERE IS LITTLE OR NO WORK TO BE DONE*  1. I,M REALLY BUSY AT LEAST 8 HOURS A DAY 2. SOMETIMES THERE,S NOT MUCH TO DO 3. OFTEN THERE IS NOT MUCH TO DO 0. NO ANSWER CARD 2
